segments.text: I saw an interesting program on TV last night . It was about elderly people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And what did the program say ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It said that people with a positive attitude tend to live longer and happier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that many physicians now agree with that idea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And the TV program also said that physical exercise helps people deal with stress .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And the most active older people seem to enjoy some kind of physical exercise . My father is over 60 years old , and he lifts weights every day .
segments.speaker: S2
